characters.name: Kathryn
text: (username), what's the hold up? You're late for your first day of work!

characters.name: Player
text: Ahh! *Shake

characters.name: Narrator
text: Geez... I can't believe she was standing right outside my door!

characters.name: Kathryn
text: Don't be so startled, I plan on dropping by here often to check on you.
It's part of my job to see how everyone is doing after all.
But enough chit-chat and dawdling around. Get going! _closedeyes

characters.name: Player
text: Y-Yes ma'am!

characters.name: Narrator
text: I hurriedly race down the flight of stairs and happen to spot Lukkas walking beside another woman. &Fireflies and Stardust
Lukkas notices me rushing down in a frenzy and laughs.

characters.name: Lukkas
text: Oh hey (username)! A-ha! You're late on your first day, eh~? _grin

characters.name: Narrator
text: I return a slightly bitter, sheepish smile.

characters.name: Player
text: Uhh... Juuust a little, haha.

characters.name: Narrator
text: The figure standing next to Lukkas with neat, wavy pink hair glances over warmly.

characters.name: Olivya
text: Hi, (username). It's nice to meet you, my name is Olivya. I'm happy to be finally working with you! _neutral
I was busy yesterday so I wasn't able to get to meet you until now.

characters.name: Player
text: Wow, Olivya's a beautiful name. Yes, me too!

characters.name: Narrator
text: She chuckles a little.

characters.name: Olivya
text: You're so kind. _smile

characters.name: Lukkas
text: Ah! I wanted to ask you something, (username)! How's Sir Vyktor doing? _neutral

ui.name: Button
text: Who's Sir Vyktor?

ui.name: Button
text: He's doing great! I've been talking to him every day, he's a nice guy!

ui.name: Button
text: I've watered it today.

characters.name: Narrator
text: Lukkas looks slightly discontent.

characters.name: Lukkas
text: Really, You seriously don't know? Sir Vyktor is the plant I gave to you yesterday! _pout
I even wrote a little tag on the front of his flowerpot, didn't you see it?

characters.name: Player
text: Oh, so the plant has a name... Maybe I should be more observant

characters.name: Narrator
text: My answer seems to have shocked him. I wonder why?

characters.name: Lukkas
text: ... _shocked
Ookaayyy. That's a little strange. _neutral
Oh, haha wait! You're just pullin' my leg, aren't 'ya?
C'mon (username), don't scare me like that! _nervous
You are kidding, right? _pout

ui.name: Button
text: Yeah, I was just tricking you

characters.name: Lukkas
text: Ha! I knew you were the joker type all along! _grin

characters.name: Narrator
text: I laugh along with him, though I'm actually confused.
Maybe I should actually look at whoever this 'Sir Vyktor' is again.

characters.name: Lukkas
text: That's great! Keep taking good care of him! _happy
Plant lovers are known to be really nice people. Maybe you're a good person too! _grin

characters.name: Narrator
text: I continue to chat with Lukkas and Olivya on the way over to our work station when suddenly...

characters.name: Player
text: ...! *Shake
Ah! I'm sorry!

characters.name: Narrator
text: The stern-looking figure I had just bumped into merely casts a momentary gaze in my direction before redirecting his focus elsewhere, carrying on his usual way.

characters.name: Player
text: That... was weird.

characters.name: Lukkas
text: Oh, him? Yeah, he's always been a bit like that... Dunno why. _pout
He's a good person though, always on time for everything and all. _neutral

characters.name: Narrator
text: So he's the silent type, huh... He didn't even bother to say a word after I bumped into just now.
He didn't seem particularly fazed about the fact that I completed my training yesterday either.
Or... Maybe he just doesn't like talking with people he doesn't know well enough.
I watch Lukkas and Olivya walk ahead of me, with a smile.
Either way, I'll probably run into these people a lot more from here on out. Yuumei Post Office sure has an interesting bunch of people. |

characters.name: Player
text: Okay, let's see who I need to deliver to today...

characters.name: Narrator
text: I briefly look at today's agenda.
It looks like I have to deliver an urgent parcel before noon, and the rest of the day is just running the usual errands for ordinary mail.
I check that I have everything packed with me and head out to start my first delivery job. I'm kind of excited, actually!

characters.name: Narrator
text: The marketplace is busier than usual, and an accompaniment of music sounds in the distance. I think I hear an accordion and a clarinet. &Bushwick Tarantella Loop
As I walk closer, I hear a lot of people talking over each other, especially at the centre of the market.
Everyone seems to be crowding around something or someone.

characters.name: Magician
text: Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! Don't you blink!
You're about to witness one of THE best magic shows you'll ever get to lay your eyes upon!

characters.name: Player
text: They're doing magic? That sounds really cool...!
Maybe I can take a quick look...

characters.name: Narrator
text: I squeeze into the crowd to get a closer look at the busker. The crowd's gaze is all fixated on the busker as they cheer in excitement.
Ugh... I can barely get past the crowd to see anything. There's too many people!
As I look around the crowd, my eyes are being drawn to the back pocket of a man in front of me. Dangling money.
The people in the crowd are colliding into each other as they cheer in sheer excitement, causing the man's money to slip out of his pocket.

characters.name: Narrator
text: I turn my head to look briefly in both ways, but nobody has seemed to notice that his money has dropped on the ground. Do I...

ui.name: Button
text: Keep the money

ui.name: Button
text: Pick it up and return it to the man

characters.name: Narrator
text: I lower myself and bend down slightly to carefully pick up the fallen money. Just as I was about to quickly place it in my pocket...

characters.name: Olivya
text: ... ^cloakon_frown

characters.name: Narrator
text: I hear a hushed, familiar voice, calling out eagerly from behind.

characters.name: Olivya
text: Hey, that's not a good idea (username)

characters.name: Narrator
text: Olivya took the money from my hand and gave it back to the man who dropped it.

characters.name: Man
text: O thank you young lady. How kind of you.

characters.name: Olivya
text: Not at all sir _smile

characters.name: Narrator
text: Olivya's wrist band glowed green. The number on her wrist changed from 6 to 6.1

characters.name: Olivya
text: As expected I got an upgrade~ _bigsmile

characters.name: Man
text: O thank you young man. How kind of you.

characters.name: Player
text: No problem!

characters.name: Narrator
text: I noticed my wrist band is glowing green and the number on my wrist changed from 5 to 5.1
I hear a hushed, familiar voice, calling out eagerly from behind.

characters.name: Olivya
text: Nicely done (username), looks like you got an upgrade ^cloakon_smile

characters.name: Player
text: ...? An upgrade?

characters.name: Narrator
text: We soon walked away from the crowd and until Olivya turned around to talk to me.
I notice that we're both wearing the same kind of gadget on our wrists, but I'm not so sure what it's really for...

characters.name: Olivya
text: Is there something you need to know? _neutral

ui.name: Button
text: How does the wristband work?

ui.name: Button
text: The wristband glowed green just now. Why was that?

ui.name: Button
text: What happens if you do something bad?

ui.name: Button
text: What happens if my number hits rock bottom?

ui.name: Button
text: I don't need to ask anything

characters.name: Olivya
text: You're a funny one aren't you (username) _worried
Did you really forget how it works?

characters.name: Narrator
text: I tried my best to remember anything about the wristband... but I got nothing.
Seeing that I have difficulty remembering, Olivya chuckled a bit.

characters.name: Olivya
text: Okay, okay. How about refresh your memory?. _laugh
To put it simply. It's a device that tracks our good and bad deeds. _smile

characters.name: Player
text: Are you the only one with a wristband?

characters.name: Olivya
text: No, everyone at Yuumei wears one. Everyone in this town to be precise. The exact same one you're wearing. _neutral
The wristband is linked by a system we all use, where our ranking starts on number 5 by default. _smallsmile
Don't even bother trying to take it off. Nobody has been able to thus far. _smile
But hey, you may as well try looking good while you're at it! _bigsmile

characters.name: Olivya
text: Oh, Isn't it kind of pretty? _smallsmile
By returning the money, a good deed was done, so a small upgrade was rewarded and the number went up. _smile
Keep carrying out good deeds and you'll gain some great benefits!
It's a win-win for everyone! _bigsmile

characters.name: Olivya
text: If you do anything bad, your wristband will glow red. _pouty
And you don't want that (username). The number on the wristband determines your privileges in the town, so keep it as high as you can. _smile

characters.name: Olivya
text: You better not be thinking of anything stupid (username) _frown
Because no one knows... _neutral
...No one knows what happens when your number drops to 0. _pouty
But... it is said, that people get locked away in the town guard's cell... and they don't come back out for a long while. _neutral
Hey (username), we may have only just met this morning, but I believe you're not going to be that person. _smallsmile
You'll be fine! _laugh

characters.name: Olivya
text: Oh, Would you look at the time! _suprised
You should get back to work, your bag is still looking pretty full. _worried
See you back at Yuumei, (username) _bigsmile

characters.name: Narrator
text: We split up into different directions. I continue my walk to the delivery address of the receiver of the urgent parcel. |

characters.name: Player
text: I haven't really been to this area before. It seems much quieter here...

characters.name: Narrator
text: On the way over, I spot two villagers gesturing wildly and creating some commotion.

characters.name: Mae
text: Oh my gosh!! Do you know who delivered a parcel to my door the other day? _shocked

characters.name: Juun
text: Oh, who, who? _wink

characters.name: Mae
text: Evaan! Seriously, how scary is that guy? He doesn't even look you in the eyes when he talks to you!

characters.name: Juun
text: I think he doesn't look like a bad person, but he always acts so suspicious. _frown

characters.name: Mae
text: Right? The other day I heard this from my neighbour-

characters.name: Narrator
text: They're talking about Evaan... I'm kinda curious about it but I'm also running out of time to deliver the parcel.. Should I...

ui.name: Button
text: Join in the gossip

ui.name: Button
text: Walk closer to eavesdrop on the conversation

ui.name: Button
text: Ignore and continue to deliver the parcel

characters.name: Narrator
text: I approach the villagers and open my mouth to speak

characters.name: Player
text: You're right, he's so weird. He bumped into me the other day and just stared at me.
He didn't even say a thing-not even sorry!

characters.name: Narrator
text: The rosy, pink-haired woman looks over to me and nods.

characters.name: Mae
text: I totally understand. He's always so quiet. _laugh
I tried to be nice one day and asked him how he was but he just brushed me off and ignored my question.

characters.name: Juun
text: Maybe he didn't hear you... _neutral

characters.name: Mae
text: Maybe... _neutral
Wait... _confused

characters.name: Narrator
text: She turns to look at me curiously.

characters.name: Mae
text: Who are you? _shocked

characters.name: Juun
text: A postman uniform...I haven't seen you before though. You're new?

characters.name: Player
text: Oh, yeah... I just started today.

characters.name: Mae
text: Why you're a gossip lover just like us! _bigsmile
My name is Mae by the way, and this is Juun. _smile

characters.name: Narrator
text: She gestures to the man in blue coloured hair in front of her.

characters.name: Juun
text: So what brought you here today? _smile

characters.name: Player
text: Ah! Oh no! I have an urgent parcel I need to deliver! I'll catch you guys some time soon!

characters.name: Narrator
text: I give both of them waves as I scurry off in a hurry.

characters.name: Mae
text: Did you know? My next door neighbour said something about him last week. _neutral

characters.name: Juun
text: What did they say? _frown

characters.name: Mae
text: They said that they saw Evaan lurking in the middle of the late night and heard crashing sounds. _confused

characters.name: Juun
text: What's he doing up so late at night? _confused

characters.name: Mae
text: Creepy, right? My neighbour said that he was trying to crush the bracelet on his arm or something. _neutral

characters.name: Narrator
text: .. *snap*

characters.name: Juun
text: ... _wideeyed

characters.name: Mae
text: ... _shocked

characters.name: Narrator
text: While they were talking, I carelessly stepped on a twig and made it snap and before I knew it, the two heads turned in the direction of the sound. Whoops. @Twig

characters.name: Juun
text: Hey, did you hear that snapping sound just now?

characters.name: Mae
text: I did! Who's there? Come out from behind already~ _wideeyed

characters.name: Narrator
text: I sheepishly step out from behind a nearby wall.

characters.name: Juun
text: Hearing on our conversation, hey~? _wink

characters.name: Narrator
text: One of the villagers look at me as if they were examining my uniform closely.

characters.name: Juun
text: A postman uniform...I haven't seen you before though. You're new? _neutral

characters.name: Player
text: Oh, yeah... I just started today.

characters.name: Mae
text: Why you're a gossip lover just like us! _bigsmile
My name is Mae by the way, and this is Juun. _smile

characters.name: Narrator
text: She gestures to the man in blue coloured hair in front of her.

characters.name: Juun
text: So what brought you here today? _smile

characters.name: Player
text: Ah! Oh no! I have an urgent parcel I need to deliver! I'll catch you guys some time soon!

characters.name: Narrator
text: I hurriedly scramble over to the address of the door I'm supposed to deliver to and make three knocks on the door, anticipating an answer.

characters.name: Nensy
text: There you are! My parcel was supposed to arrive an hour ago. Where has it been!? _angry

characters.name: Narrator
text: She looks very cross. This isn't good...

ui.name: Button
text: I'm sorry, ma'am. We had a few delays on the way over there.

ui.name: Button
text: Isn't it daylight savings time?

characters.name: Nensy
text: Sorry's not going to help me bake my cake! I needed my baking whisk earlier to bake this cake for my niece's birthday but now it's too late!
You mail people need to be more punctual! _neutral

characters.name: Nensy
text: Are you trying to pull a joke on me? I know what time it is!

characters.name: Narrator
text: The woman looks me in the eye. Maybe I better not mess around...

characters.name: Nensy
text: It's late... but I'll still be able to make my cake, I guess. Would've been nicer if I had it earlier, though.
Thank you for the parcel...

characters.name: Player
text: Oh boy, that could have gone better...

characters.name: Narrator
text: But those villagers from before were talking about Evaan, weren't they?
I should keep all this in mind.
Well. Time for me to head back to the post office.

characters.name: Narrator
text: I decided not to join their conversation, I'd be late after all!

characters.name: Narrator
text: I head straight over to the designated address and make three firm knocks on the door.

characters.name: Nensy
text: Oh, and you are...?

characters.name: Player
text: Here's your parcel, ma'am.

characters.name: Narrator
text: She lights up at the sight of the parcel.

characters.name: Nensy
text: Ah it's Yuumei Post! Thank you ever so much for arriving here- and earlier than I expected, too! _pleased
I'll be able to bake a cake for my niece's birthday with this!

ui.name: Button
text: What kind of cake?

ui.name: Button
text: Say happy birthday to them for me

characters.name: Nensy
text: Orange cake with a dash of whipped cream on the side. It's her favourite.

characters.name: Nensy
text: I will! You're too kind. We might order from Yuumei Post again, you're so efficient!

characters.name: Nensy
text: I'll be using this now. Thank you for the parcel, have a nice day!

characters.name: Player
text: You too!

characters.name: Narrator
text: With my hands now free and the parcel delivered, I start walking back to the post office carrying on with my usual day with a bit of paperwork here and there. Until...

characters.name: Guard
text: Who's that on the ground?!
There's a girl!

characters.name: Narrator
text: Wait... Was that Olivya's voice I heard?

characters.name: Olivya
text: ... _suprised

characters.name: Narrator
text: Sure enough, Olivya comes running through the door of the post office looking fairly panicked.
She spots me and frantically gestures with her hands, for me to come over.

characters.name: Narrator
text: We reach the outside of the post office and I'm shocked at what I see.
There's a white-haired girl donning a long coat who fainted just by the stairs to the post office.

characters.name: Silvya
text: No...! I... I'm not going with you. You cannot make me! _unconscious
Don't... don't take me away. I will not go!

characters.name: Olivya
text: What is she talking about...? _suprised

characters.name: Narrator
text: In that moment, the post office door swings opens then shuts as Lukkas comes out to have a look as well.

characters.name: Lukkas
text: Woah! Who's this? _shocked

characters.name: Narrator
text: The girl's eyes remain shut, but she stirs despite being unconscious.

characters.name: Lukkas
text: Can you hear us? Wake up...!

characters.name: Narrator
text: Lukkas crouches down by her side to shake her by the shoulders, to which the girl remains still until... she rises to sit upright in an almost eerie fashion.

characters.name: Silvya
text: You are all prisoners trapped inside of Yuumei. This is all fake.

characters.name: Narrator
text: I feel a cold shiver being sent down my spine as she looks in my direction. Her face screams a sense of familiarity, but I don't think I know her at all...

characters.name: Lukkas
text: What did you say? I... don't think I caught that... _nervous

characters.name: Olivya
text: She's not making sense... _pouty

characters.name: Narrator
text: Then, as if just now comprehending what had just been said, the girl cups her hand over her mouth, baffled.

characters.name: Silvya
text: O-oh my! I apologise! _neutral

characters.name: Narrator
text: She gives a downcast expression with a slight hint of shame.

characters.name: Lukkas
text: Are you okay? What did you say just now? _shocked

characters.name: Silvya
text: Ah.. Don't mind it... I'm not too sure myself...  _sad
My head hurts... _unconscious

characters.name: Narrator
text: Kathryn who had arrived not too long ago hurriedly crouches down next to Lukkas and checks on the girl
Somehow the usually composed glance on her face has vanished...

characters.name: Kathryn
text: You heard the girl! Don't listen to any of the trivial nonsense she's spouting! _angry

characters.name: Narrator
text: She had shouted, and the shout rung in our ears.
The delivery people of Yuumei Post ever-so-gradually draw their attention over to their mentor, myself included.
I can't quite make light of what's going on...
Kathryn momentarily pauses before shaking her head.

characters.name: Kathryn
text: The... the girl just needs her rest. Get her indoors right away. _neutral

characters.name: Narrator
text: Kathryn looks at me with an odd hint of uncertainty, something I haven't seen in her eyes before.

characters.name: Narrator
text: She turns to leave, as Olivya and Lukkas help the girl indoors, and I'm once again standing in the front of the post office by myself.
Nothing has changed outside, there's people walking, carrying on with their usual lives
Playing music-everything had remained just as it had, a mere ten minutes ago, yet for some reason..
I can't shake this feeling.
The atmosphere is uneasy, and I'm not sure what to think. Who was that girl? And why had she collapsed outside our post office?
I'm left with a myriad of questions in my mind.
What did she mean that we were... prisoners?
